content: direct link to pattern pdf 1 pattern is entirely in japanese but charted using standard crochet symbols no gauge is listed in the pattern **materials** enough for *both* parrots * japanese size 8/0 5 0 mm crochet hook * 8 different colors of pierrot yuttari acrylic small amounts of each color * scraps of pierrot long fur or appropriate fun fur *for the male parrot only* includes directions for amigurumi parrots one male and one female note the japanese word *inko* means true parrot and could refer to a parrot parakeet lory or conure i don t know enough about bird species to know which ones these are supposed to be 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/27ss/27-528i pdf
